description: This file defines API routes related to resource listing in a FastAPI web application. It includes an endpoint for retrieving paginated lists of resources with optional filters, utilizing dependencies for database sessions and security.

classes.name: ResourceOut
classes.description: Pydantic model for serializing resource data in responses.

classes.name: ResourceListResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for paginated resource list responses.

methods.name: ResourceListResponse list_resources_endpoint( provider: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by provider (aws|azure|gcp)"), region: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by region (e.g., us-east-1)"), state: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by state"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Page size"), _user=Depends(get_current_user), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve a filtered and paginated list of resources.

ctags.name: list_resources_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( provider: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by provider (aws|azure|gcp)"), region: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by region (e.g., us-east-1)"), state: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by state"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Page size"), _user=Depends(get_current_user), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
